content:
796 
 
 
   (xviii) CHRISTOPHER requires two (2) 'A' level passes in Geography 
and any other Science subject, Economics or Government. 
Accepts HND, ND or NCE credit in the relevant 
programmes/subjects.  
(xix) PLASU accepts  
a. Degree in any programme provided the candidate meets UTME 
requirements.  
b. HND minimum of lower credit in relevant programme plus UTME 
requirements.  
c. ND minimum of lower credit in relevant programme plus UTME 
requirements.  
d. IJMB minimum of 7 points with passes in relevant subjects, plus 
UTME requirements.  
e. Does not  accept university diplomas and other diplomas not 
accredited by the relevant accrediting bodies.  
  
UTME  
(i) JOS requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes to include 
Mathematics, English Language and Biology.  
(ii) UNN requires 'O' level credit passes in English Language, 
Biology or Health Science, and any other three (3) subjects at 
least a pass in Mathematics or Statistics.  
(iii) IBADAN accepts Science subjects with a pass in ‘O’ level 
Mathematics.  
(iv) OAU requires five (5 ) 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Biology and any two (2) from 
Geography, Economics, Government, Chemistry, Physics, 
History, Literature in English, Yoruba, Christian Religious 
Studies /Islamic Studies, Agricultural Science, ICT, Civic 
Education.  
(v) UYO and IMSU require 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Biology/Health Science plus a pass in Mathematics. 
UYO requires a credit pass in Biology or Health Science and at 
least a D7 pass in Mathematics.  
(vi) UNIZIK requires similar r equirements as for Economics, for 
both Direct Entry and UTME applicants but a pass in ‘O’ level 
Mathematics is acceptable.  
(vii) GOUU requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes to include English 
language, Mathematics, Biology and any other two (2) Science,  
Social Science or Arts subjects at not more than one (1) sitting.
